source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_00<tab>F'mibhas of the Archers' Guild wishes you to deliver a sealed message to the markets.
target: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_00<tab>弓術士ギルドの冒険者フ・ミバスは、ある封書を商店街へ届けてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_01<tab>Take the sealed message you received from F'mibhas to the markets and deliver it to Parnell in the Shaded Bower.
target: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_01<tab>フ・ミバスから預かった封書を、商店街の木陰の東屋にいる「パーネル」に届けよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_02<tab>Parnell reveals that the message from F'mibhas was a request concerning the availability of stock at the markets. She wonders why the adventurer didn't simply speak with her directly, and reflects on the prickly impression outsiders have of Gridanians.
target: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_SEQ_02<tab>封書の内容は、商店街の品揃いに関する要望だった。直接言ってくれればいいのに、と言うパーネル。しかし彼女自身も、グリダニアの住民のとっつきにくさを自覚しているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the sealed message to Parnell in the markets.
target: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_TODO_00<tab>商店街のパーネルにフ・ミバスの封書を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_1<tab>Hail, adventurer! Might you have a moment?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_1……あ！
ねえねえ、あなた、冒険者でしょ？
今ちょっといい？

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_2<tab>I am in need of a trustworthy soul to deliver a missive to Parnell. You can find her in the Shaded Bower, in the midst of the markets.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_2この封書を、商店街の中央「木陰の東屋」にいる
受付の「パーネル」に届けてほしいの。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_3<tab>Hm? Why would I not simply go and speak with her myself?
target: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_3<tab>え？　何で自分で行かないかって？

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_4<tab>Well, uh...as I am sure you have observed...Gridanians have a tendency to be rather... Ahem. I mean...<var 1A 02 /var>in person<var 1A 01 /var>, they can be...well...a little on the prickly side.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_4だってホラ、グリダニアの人ってなんていうか……
無愛想だし、融通が利かないから
直接話すと面倒くさいじゃない。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_5<tab>The matter is not urgent─simply hand over the missive the next time you find yourself in the markets. Please, as a favor from one adventurer to another!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_FMIBHAS_000_5急ぎじゃないし、何かのついででいいから。
ホラ、同じ冒険者のよしみでさぁ……
じゃ、よろしくね。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_10<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Might you be looking to secure the services of a retainer?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_10はい、こちらはリテイナー受付カウンターです。
何かご用でしょうか？

source:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_11What's this? A missive from F'mibhas, you say? Whatever could it be about? Let me see, now...
...Hm? She wants to know about the available stock of potions at the markets.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_11えっ……冒険者のフ・ミバスさんからの封書？
……なるほど、商店街の品揃えへの要望書みたいですね。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_12<tab>Hardly a matter that warrants a letter, much less the hiring of a courier! Why could she not ask the question in person? <sigh> I sense that adventurers from beyond our borders find Gridanians somewhat difficult to deal with.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_12手紙でなく、直接言ってくださればいいのに……。
どうも、他都市からいらした冒険者の方は、
我々グリダニアの人が苦手なようです。

source: TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_13<tab>Are we truly so devoid of warmth? If we mistrust outsiders, it is only because so many of them have brought chaos to the Twelveswood─and such sins as theirs are not soon forgotten. Yet...I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>might<var 1A 01 /var> endeavor to be a little less...cold.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST001_00024_PARNELL_000_13愛想が足りないのでしょうか……それとも、親しさ……？
見慣れない方を受け入れるのに、なかなか慣れなくて。
もっと頑張らないといけませんね。
